string_format

This component formats the string inputs [In]s1 and [In]s2 when triggered by the input event. The formatting is performed as specified by the Format parameter, which uses C-style formatting conventions. If only one of the two input strings is connected, then the formatting will be performed on that string only. If both input strings are connected then the two string will be formatted.

Ports

  • [In] s1:

    Data input.

  • [In] s2:

    Data input.

  • [Out] :

    Data output, the result of the formatting.

  • [In] :

    Input event, formats the input strings [In]s1 and [In]s2 when fired.

  • [Out] :

    Output event.

Parameters

  • Format:

    C-style format string

    Data Type:

    S

    Min Value:

    %s%s

    Max Value:

    Default Value:

    None

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
